text: How do I use the Binomial function to solve this experiment:   n=18, p=0.1 ans success x=2.  The answer is 28% .  How can I solve this in Julia?

elements.text: How do I use the Binomial function to solve this experiment:   n=18, p=0.1 ans success x=2.  The answer is 28% .  How can I solve this in Julia?

text: You could define a recursive function to calculate n choose r, then multiply p^2 * (1-p)^16
